105788,Decommissioning of online services for older Ubisoft games (January 2024),"
Decommissioning the online services for older games is something we do not take lightly, however, it is also a necessity as the technology behind these services becomes outdated.
As a result, we will decommission the online services of several games across different platforms on 25 January 2024.
Below you will find a detailed breakdown of the effects from this round of decommissions, per platform:

You will be unable to play multiplayer, link Ubisoft accounts in-game or use online features. 
 
Additionally, the Ubisoft Connect rewards will be unavailable.

99331,Reporting a bug in Ubisoft games,"
We encourage you to report issues to in order to help us better understand the needs of our community.
To report a bug, you will need the following information:

column2: >An overview of the steps taking to reach the bug.
>The expected behaviour of the game at this time.
>A workaround if you manage to find a way around the issue.
>Additional information such as images or videos.

column1: A selection of Ubisoft titles have dedicated bug reporting tools that you can use:
If you wish to report a bug for any of these games, please use the available tool.

To report a bug in other Ubisoft games, please contact us.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000099331

103618,Keeping your Stadia save files for Ubisoft games,"
Following the shutdown of Stadia on 18 January 2023, you will be able to continue playing your existing saved games on any Ubisoft game which supports cross-progression.
Your progress will transfer automatically for most games through your Ubisoft Connect account. However, you will need to transfer your saved games manually for some games before Stadia shuts down.
To continue playing with your existing save files, you need to log into the same Ubisoft account on the platform you wish to continue playing on.
You will be able to automatically continue playing these games if you own them on any other platform the game is available on:
To continue playing these games, you will need to transfer your save files manually by 18 January 2023, using specific instructions for each game:
* Please note that it is only possible to transfer your saved games for The Division 2 from Stadia to PC.
** Cross-progression is available between platforms in the same family of consoles for the single-player campaign and the Bloodline story expansion. Your save files need to be transferred manually.
Your progress for Online Mode is available automatically on any other platforms Watch Dogs: Legion is available on.

62697,Location of Secrets of the First Pyramids,"

Secrets of the First Pyramids will then appear in your quest log.

To start this quest, travel to Saqqara Nome and speak to Merkes.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000062697

101232,Earning Alpha Packs in Rainbow Six Siege,"
You can earn Alpha Packs in Rainbow Six Siege by:
You will have a chance to receive an Alpha Pack after each match you win through the post-match Loot screen.
Each pack contains a random cosmetic: a weapon charm, a weapon skin, or headgear.
The rarity of the items range from Common to Legendary.

If you unlock an item you already own, instead of a duplicate item you will receive Renown based on its rarity.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000101232

104333,Accessing Just Dance subscriptions on Nintendo Switch,"
Please be aware that online services in Just Dance 2016, Just Dance 2017, and Just Dance 2018 will be unavailable from 30 June 2023.

Just Dance+ (available for Just Dance 2023 Edition) and Just Dance Unlimited are on-demand streaming services. Each of them grants you access to a catalogue of songs, playable for the duration of your purchased subscription.
To access your subscription on Nintendo Switch, please make sure that you:
Activate the subscription on the correct Nintendo account
Make sure you are purchasing your subscription on the same Nintendo account you purchased Just Dance on.
Link your Ubisoft account to your Nintendo account
Make sure your Ubisoft account is linked to the same Nintendo account your game and subscription are purchased on.
Setting or changing the primary console for the Nintendo account you purchased the subscription on will allow the activation of the subscription.
Your Just Dance+ or Just Dance Unlimited subscription will be shared between Nintendo Switch accounts if the purchase was made by the console'

When your Just Dance+ or Just Dance Unlimited pass expires, you will no longer have access to the content or the unlocked avatars.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000104333

64731,"Error message ""A Ubisoft service is not available at the moment"" on Ubisoft Connect PC","
This error occurs when Ubisoft Connect PC is unable to connect to Ubisoft Services.
Please check the Ubisoft Help home page to see if there are any ongoing degradations or outages for Ubisoft Services or Ubisoft Connect.

If there are no ongoing service issues, please try our troubleshooting guide.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000064731

column2:
s Creed Valhalla, this may be due to your NAT type.

Should your NAT status show as anything other than Open or Single NAT, you may need to forward ports to your device.

72650,Changing the game difficulty,"You have the opportunity to change the in-game difficulty once you have launched a new game. To do this, please follow the steps below:

column8:
>
- Once you have started a new game, if you want to change the difficulty level of your game, head to the main menu and select Options.

- Enter the Gameplay sub-menu.
column14:
>
- Then, highlight Difficulty and select the level of your choice.

66168,Crafting in Far Cry 5,"Many useful items can be crafted by players themselves: homeopathics and explosives such as dynamite or Molotovs.

To craft items, you'
column2:
ll need the required materials. You can pick up the necessary components while exploring. Components for explosives can be found in buildings, chests and on other characters whereas ingredients for homeopathics mostly grow in the wild. You can check the materials that are available to you in your inventory. 

Bring up the Wheel menu for crafting: the Weapons Wheel for explosives, the Utility Wheel for homeopathics. Highlight the item you'
column3:
d like to craft and press the key indicated on the screen. If you have the necessary space and components, this will add a new item of this type. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us! 

 ",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000066168

100657,Information about Ubisoft gift cards,"
Ubisoft Gift Cards allow you to gift Wallet credit to a friend.

They can be bought digitally in the Ubisoft Store and are sent by email.

Your purchase will be subject to availability of the Ubisoft Gift Cards and Ubisoft Wallet in your region.
The redemption of your Ubisoft Gift Card can be subject to some restrictions.

Please get in touch in case of a missing gift card order or, if you are missing gift card funds after redemption.

61900,Button mapping in Far Cry New Dawn,"When using a controller, you have the ability to change the mapping of your controls.

If you are playing on PC, you can also customise your key mappings.
 
To start customising your controller layout:
column2:
>- Enter Options from the main menu.
- Select Gamepad.
- Navigate to General.
In this menu, you can adjust your look sensitivity and choose which set of controls you would like to change.
column10:
>- Choose one of the control sets (Ground, Vehicles, Helicopters).
- Select the binding you wish to change.
- Choose the button you would like to bind to the action from the list.
If the button is already assigned to a different action, the two bindings will be swapped to ensure each action is bound to a unique button.

80268,Unable to launch Watch Dogs: Legion on PC,"
Depending on how the issue shows (crash to desktop, a black screen or something else), troubleshooting steps can vary.

To rule out the most common scenarios, please:
column2:
>Check if your PC meets the system requirements for Watch Dogs: Legion
If your setup does not meet the minimum requirements for the game, launching it may be impossible.
column3:
>Complete our general troubleshooting guide
The guide contains a set of universal troubleshooting steps that often resolve issues with launching the game.
If you continue having trouble with launching the game, please do not hesitate to contact us, attaching your DxDiag and MSinfo reports to the case.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000080268

61584,Hiding games in Ubisoft Connect,"
The Games tab in Ubisoft Connect PC shows the games that you own, as well as any free-to-play games available to you.
Your games will be displayed in categories, such as "
To make managing large libraries easier, you can move games from any of the existing categories into a Hidden category.
To move a game into the Hidden category:

column2: >•  Right-click on the game you want to hide.

column1: The game will now appear in the Hidden category at the bottom of the Games tab.
Please note that your game activity for titles in the Hidden category will still be visible to your Ubisoft Connect friends.
The game will also remain visible in your catalogue on the Ubisoft Connect website.
To remove a game from the Hidden category:

column2: >•  Select the Hidden category at the bottom of the window.
>•  Right-click on the game you want to remove.

99606,Windows security blocking access to Ubisoft Connect PC,"
If you are unable to save your game or if you lose your progression, this could mean that Ubisoft Connect PC is unable to access files on your system.
To resolve this issue, please launch Ubisoft Connect PC with administrative rights. This will help ensure that the desktop app has the necessary permissions to create save files on your system.
Windows Security settings may also prevent Ubisoft Connect PC from modifying or updating the necessary files.

If launching Ubisoft Connect PC with administrative rights did not resolve the issue, please give Ubisoft Connect PC access to controlled folders in Windows Security before launching and saving your game again.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000099606

76856,Information about cookies on the Ubisoft websites,"
Cookies are small text files your web browser stores on your computer when you access a Ubisoft website. They allow the site to recognise your device to offer you a more personalised experience, internally track site traffic, remember your login details, and for social features. 

Enabling cookies means that your Ubisoft username and preferences for a particular Ubisoft website are saved for each time you visit.

You will be asked to confirm if you want to accept cookies the first time you visit a website, to comply with EU regulations.
You can change your settings at any time by selecting Set Cookies on the footer of any Ubisoft website.
You can remove cookies at any time by following your browser-specific instructions:

104647,Cross-progression in Trackmania,"
Trackmania supports automatic cross-progression between all platforms.
When playing the game on a different platform, please make sure you are logging in with the same Ubisoft account.
Some in-game content will also be shared across platforms.

97180,Manually updating older Ubisoft games,"While many of our older games can be found on Ubisoft Connect PC, some titles are not linked to the launcher. As such, you need to update them manually to apply patches.

column2: >•  Locate and select your game in the list of games.

>•  Download all patch files that apply to your game.
>•  Install the patches in order of version with admin rights.

column1:
Sometimes additional steps may be required to try to run the fully patched game on Windows 10.

Feel free to get in touch if you have additional questions.",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000097180

79352,Silvers and Helix Credits in Assassin's Creed Valhalla,"
There are two types of currency in Assassin'
column2: s Creed Valhalla: Silvers and Helix Credits.

column1: Silvers can be earned by completing in-game activities. It can be used to make bets, buy resources and gear, and occasionally solve disputes.
The Forgotten Saga downloadable content (DLC) introduces a range of new currencies that can be found in Niflheim.
Helix Credits can be purchased through the in-game store or the Ubisoft Store. They can be used to buy cosmetic items and consumables.
If you are unable to find your Helix Credits in-game, please check your transaction history to make sure the purchase has been completed:
It can take up to 24 hours for Helix Credits to be added to your game, so please allow some time for the balance to be updated.
Please note that Helix Credits are bound to the platform and account you purchased them for, and cannot be shared.

If your purchase has not appeared in your game after 24 hours please get in touch, providing us with a screenshot of your transaction history and letting us know which store you purchased your Helix Credits from.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000079352

61934,Equinox upgrades,"
After progressing through the main missions, you will be able to upgrade the Equinox and unlock special abilities to help you with your exploration.

Unlocking these new features will allow you to improve your Starship and strengthen your presence in Atlas. 

Each pilot in the game has individual strengths and abilities. That means your adventure might play a little differently depending on the pilot you are using. Some features can only be used by specific pilots. Don'
column2: t worry though, you can complete the full game with any pilot!

95486,Troubleshooting technical issues on PlayStation 5,"
If you encounter issues with the performance of a game on your PlayStation 5 (such as stuttering or crashes), please try the below steps in the order listed, testing the issue after each step:

column2: >Make sure your system is up to date
>Running your console on an outdated version of the operating system may cause performance issues.
>You should try to always install system updates when they become available.
>Performing a full power cycle allows your console to shut down fully before restarting, and may resolve the issues you are experiencing.
>You can disconnect your PlayStation 5 from the internet by manually unplugging the Ethernet cable from the console, or by disabling the Wi-Fi connection through the system settings.
>•  Go to the console’s home screen and select Settings.
>•  When your console is no longer online, launch your game again before reconnecting to the internet.
>Restoring licences can help if your game or content is unavailable or frequently crashes.

column1: Placing the console in Safe Mode allows you to rebuild its database.
Restoring the database to may resolve some issues you are experiencing.
Before trying Safe Mode, make sure to back up your data, as some Safe Mode options may result in its loss.
Check the installation location of your game
If your game is located on an external hard drive, reinstalling your game on the internal hard drive of the console may resolve some issues you are experiencing.

column2: >Make sure your game is fully installed
>Some issues might be caused by the game or content being launched before it is fully installed.
>•  Press the PlayStation button on the PlayStation Controller.
>Here you will find all games or contents still being downloaded or installed.
>You can also check if your content is installed or not on your console.
>Reinstalling the game can sometimes resolve issues if they are linked to the game itself.
>Trying the game on a different console can help you determine whether the issues you are experiencing are caused by the game, your internet connection, or the system itself.

column1: Should the issues persist after completing the above steps, please check the PlayStation Support website or contact PlayStation Support directly for further assistance.

64847,Troubleshooting performance issues in Rabbids Coding,"

If your setup meets the requirements, we recommend running the game with lower graphical settings:
>•  Set the Graphics option to Very Low and try running a game session again to see if the performance has improved.

column1:
Complete our general troubleshooting guide
The guide contains a set of universal troubleshooting steps that often resolve issues with running the game.
Please attach your DxDiag and MSInfo reports to your case when contacting us with performance related issue.",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000064847

62511,Collecting loot in The Crew 2,"
When completing a race in The Crew 2, missed or forgotten loot can be found by accessing your mailbox.
You can access the mailbox at any Head Quarters (HQs). The loot in your mailbox will be accessible via the relevant HQs hosting the race, depending on the race you completed.

Please note that if you receive loot while your mailbox is at full capacity, the excess loot will be deleted.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000062511

62726,Understanding frame rate issues,"
Your frame rate, or frames per second (FPS), affects the way motion is displayed on-screen.

A higher FPS number (such as the industry-standard 60 FPS) means any motion will appear smoother and more responsive.

Lower or frequently changing FPS can cause your game to appear slow, or make it stutter.

If you experience issues with FPS while playing on PC, please check that your device meets the system requirements for the game you are playing.

If your system does meet the minimum requirements for the game and the issues continue, please follow our graphical issues troubleshooting guide.
",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000062726

Each Pack contains a random cosmetic ranging from an Uncommon to a Legendary rarity.

It is also possible to unlock Bravo Pack items with Bravo Pack Tickets.
A Bravo Pack Ticket can be earned by reaching tier 100 in the Premium Battle Pass.

column1: *Please note that the free upgrade process for Rainbow Six: Siege is not available for PlayStation 5 in Japan. Players in Japan can upgrade to the digital PlayStation 5 version of Rainbow Six: Siege for 100¥.

96236,Checking your NAT type on PC,"
The NAT type you have affects your ability to connect and group with other players by directing traffic coming from the Internet to your local network, which happens locally on your router.
You may be able to view your NAT type in some games with online connectivity.
Alternatively, you can check if you are using double NAT. If this is the case, your NAT type may be either moderate or strict.
If you are unable to check your NAT type this way or encounter any NAT-related issues, please contact your Internet Service Provider for support.

97861,Carrying over your Rocksmith+ Closed Beta progression,"The Rocksmith+ Closed Beta is a work in progress and not a final version of the game. Once Rocksmith+ is released, you will not be able to carry over your progression to the full game.",https://www.ubisoft.com/help/game/article/title/000097861
